payment_next_action_date.help: The date before which no action should be taken.

property_stock_customer.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the destination location for goods you send to this partner

team_id.help: If set, this sales channel will be used for sales and assignations related to this partner

type.help: Used to select automatically the right address according to the context in sales and purchases documents.

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

supplier.help: Check this box if this contact is a vendor. If it's not checked, purchase people will not see it when encoding a purchase order.

notify_email.help:
Policy to receive emails for new messages pushed to your personal Inbox:
- Never: no emails are sent
- All Messages: for every noti                                                   fication you receive in your Inbox

message_bounce.help: Counter of the number of bounced emails for this contact

purchase_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

vat.help: Tax Identification Number. Fill it if the company is subjected to taxes. Used by the some of the legal statements.

property_stock_supplier.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for goods you receive from the current partner

property_payment_term_id.help: This payment term will be used instead of the default one for sales orders and customer invoices

image_small.help: Small-sized image of this contact. It is automatically resized as a 64x64px image, with aspect ratio preserved. Use this field anywhere a small image is required.

user_id.help: The internal user that is in charge of communicating with this contact if any.

opt_out.help: If opt-out is checked, this contact has refused to receive emails for mass mailing and marketing campaign. Filter 'Available for Mass Mailing' allows users to filter the partners when performing mass mailing.

image_medium.help: Medium-sized image of this contact. It is automatically resized as a 128x128px image, with aspect ratio preserved. Use this field in form views or some kanban views.

last_time_entries_checked.help: Last time the invoices & payments matching was performed for this partner. It is set either if there's not at least an unreconciled debit and an unreconciled credit or if you click the "Done" button.

debit.help: Total amount you have to pay to this vendor.

property_account_position_id.help: The fiscal position will determine taxes and accounts used for the partner.

website_url.help: The full URL to access the document through the website.

is_company.help: Check if the contact is a company, otherwise it is a person

sale_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

tz.help: The partner's timezone, used to output proper date and time values inside printed reports. It is important to set a value for this field. You should use the same timezone that is otherwise used to pick and render date and time values: your computer's timezone.

employee.help: Check this box if this contact is an Employee.

property_delivery_carrier_id.help: This delivery method will be used when invoicing from picking.

invoice_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

partner_share.help: Either customer (no user), either shared user. Indicated the current partner is a customer without access or with a limited access created for sharing data.

property_purchase_currency_id.help: This currency will be used, instead of the default one, for purchases from the current partner

credit.help: Total amount this customer owes you.

property_product_pricelist.help: This pricelist will be used, instead of the default one, for sales to the current partner

image.help: This field holds the image used as avatar for this contact, limited to 1024x1024px

has_unreconciled_entries.help: The partner has at least one unreconciled debit and credit since last time the invoices & payments matching was performed.

trust.string: Degree of trust you have in this debtor

event_count.help: Number of events the partner has participated.

message_unread.help: If checked new messages require your attention.

property_account_payable_id.help: This account will be used instead of the default one as the payable account for the current partner

calendar_last_notif_ack.string: Last notification marked as read from base Calendar

pos_order_count.help: The number of point of sales orders related to this customer

message_last_post.help: Date of the last message posted on the record.

lang.help: If the selected language is loaded in the system, all documents related to this contact will be printed in this language. If not, it will be English.

picking_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

property_account_receivable_id.help: This account will be used instead of the default one as the receivable account for the current partner

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

property_supplier_payment_term_id.help: This payment term will be used instead of the default one for purchase orders and vendor bills

currency_id.help: Utility field to express amount currency

customer.help: Check this box if this contact is a customer.
